comments: When I attempted to import the attached java xml log file, I didn't get anything in the log view.

Created an attachment (id=37993)
Java XML log file

This consistently fails in one of my workspaces but it passes when i start a fresh workspace.

Marking it as invalid

I was able to consistently reproduce this problem (Thanks Eugene for your help).  Here are the steps to reproduce it:

- Start a fresh workspace
- Import the CBE log file attached
- The log file should be sorted by creation time by default
- Now, change the sorting criteria to descending "Message"

Notice that the content of the log file disappears.  If the log file is deleted and re-imported, the content is again not displayed.

Here's the stack trace that I got:

It seems like the consumer CBE is containing null message for empty message, it could happen to any other attribute.
